title: ICYMI - Grand Master Maurice Ashley on Learning Life Lessons with Chess
itunes:title: ICYMI - Grand Master Maurice Ashley on Learning Life Lessons with Chess
description:
Chess commentator and grand master Maurice Ashley discusses his love for competitive trash-talking, playing chess in the hood and applying the game's lessons to life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
